name: Extreme Street Skateboard
description:
In Extreme Street Skateboard, you will find many tricks for kick flip, grind and combo. Relic, stunning 3D graphics with lots of challenges make you feel really good. Jump over obstacles, turn into streets, speed up as fast as you can be, all fun. Which has realistic 3D graphics and simple to play. Epic fun-to-play skateboard game, use boarding tricks and skills to complete endless arcade game.

Feature:
- Complete instructions are given.
- Amazing real physical Jump,Twist, turn and Run.
- Fantastic background music.
- avoid cars, roadblocks and barricades
- Best in all free skateboard games for boys.
